active.name: Cloudburst II
active.effects: {{tip|Dash}} to the target location and fire three homing missiles at the {{tt|most wounded|Lowest health percent}} enemy within {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 750 units of you at the end of the dash, prioritizing enemy champions. Each missile deals {{as|{{pp|150/3 to 350/3|1;8 to 18 by 1}} {{as|(+ {{fd|26.6{{recurring|6}}}}% '''bonus''' AD)}} physical damage|physical damage}}, for a total of {{as|{{pp|150 to 350|1;8 to 18 by 1}} {{as|(+ 80% '''bonus''' AD)}}|physical damage}}, increased by {{pp|type= target's '''missing''' health|color=health|key=%|0 to 50|key1=%|0 to 75 for 11|formula=5% per 7.5% of enemies' '''missing''' health}}.

effects_structured.raw: {{tip Dash}} to the target location and fire three homing missiles at the {{tt most wounded Lowest health percent}} enemy within {{tip cr icononly=true}} 750 units of you at the end of the dash, prioritizing enemy champions

Each missile deals {{as {{pp 150/3 to 350/3 1;8 to 18 by 1}} {{as (+ {{fd 26.6{{recurring 6}}}}% '''bonus''' AD)}} physical damage physical damage}}, for a total of {{as {{pp 150 to 350 1;8 to 18 by 1}} {{as (+ 80% '''bonus''' AD)}} physical damage}}, increased by {{pp type= target's '''missing''' health color=health key=% 0 to 50 key1=% 0 to 75 for 11 formula=5% per 7.5% of enemies' '''missing''' health}}.
